Description: Pottery ostracon with part of one incised line of jumbled Greek letters, from the rim of a vessel, inside smeared black.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394080) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394080)
